 (yanshosh im not sure what the final word is on this but remember this will 
not have the oracal in it or anything of the sort.)

   Magnus's button bleeped on his should. He smilied stood up and breathed 
loudly. "The base has arrived." (at the vortex) The chamber came through. 
Light at the visible helm stearing. Something was wrong. The base started to 
go down. It eventualy landed saftley. He sent a wide open comm to KIt Kat's 
base. "Come all those on the new council. Our new base has arrived."
